meanings.definition: Excessive growth of plants or vegetation.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with overgrowths of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The forest was dense with overgrowths of tall trees.
meanings.sent3: The overgrowths of vines in the backyard made it look like a jungle.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening had led to an overgrowth of plants in her yard.
meanings.sent5: The overgrowths of ivy climbing the walls created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Abnormal or excessive growth of tissue in the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the patient's overgrowths carefully.
meanings.sent2: The tumor was identified as an overgrowth of abnormal cells.
meanings.sent3: The overgrowths of scar tissue puzzled the medical team.
meanings.sent4: The overgrowths of calluses on his hands showed his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The overgrowths of muscle in his arms were a result of intense training.
